alert.note: Alert for Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:07PM CDT until April 05 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL RANKIN...SOUTHEASTERN HINDS AND SOUTH CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES... At 407 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Byram, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Jackson around 415 PM CDT. Richland around 420 PM CDT. Pearl around 425 PM CDT. Brandon and Flowood around 430 PM CDT. Ridgeland around 435 PM CDT. Madison around 440 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
